body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
There is a situation (and I think this is a common pattern) where people record their last progress right before failing an activity. This presents an annoying-to-resolve race condition for the SDK where I have to make sure I delay the completion until after flushing any pending heartbeat info from the buffer, whereas if I could send the details with the completion I can just avoid sending another heartbeat RPC alltogether. 

**Describe the solution you'd like**
`RespondActivityTaskFailedRequest` upgraded to include a details field which acts like heartbeat details

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**
Mentioned this to Max already and he's on board

title: Support recording heartbeat details as part of activity failure completions
